publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2035.1 Cathy Jamieson: Congratulations to Bathgate Thistle—As an amendment to motion (S3M-2035) in the name of Robin Harper, insert at end "; commends Cumnock Juniors on reaching the final of the competition, and recognises the history of Ayrshire football clubs who have won the Scottish Junior Cup."
S3M-2035.1 Congratulations to Bathgate Thistle (lodged on 4 June 2008) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-2035.1 Cathy Jamieson: Congratulations to Bathgate Thistle—As an amendment to motion (S3M-2035) in the name of Robin Harper, insert at end "; commends Cumnock Juniors on reaching the final of the competition, and recognises the history of Ayrshire football clubs who have won the Scottish Junior Cup." Supported by: Jamie Hepburn
